did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University
did.unittitle:
The Papers of Jackson and Walker
1900
did.abstract: One letter from twon black businessmen from Covington, Virginia to Booker T. Washington. Acc.#1976-59

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Papers of Jackson and Walker, Accession #1976-59 , Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University, Petersburg, VA.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Jackson and Walker operated a business in Covington, Virginia in the early 1900's. There firm engaged in the manufacture of soap products.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Seeking information from Booker T. Washington as President of the "Colored Business Men's League."

arrangement.head: Series Description
arrangement.p: A letter from two black businessmen to Booker T. Washington.
